mapper.insert: insert into log(loperatorid, lrole, ltype, lbehavior, lip, ltime, lmethod) values (#{loperatorid},#{lrole},#{ltype},#{lbehavior},#{lip},#{ltime},#{lmethod})
mapper.select: select * from log order by ltime desc limit #{start},${limit}

select count(*) from log
and ltime between #{start} and #{end}
and loperatorid like CONCAT('%','${opeid}','%')
and ltype like CONCAT('%','${opetype}','%')
and lbehavior like CONCAT('%','${opename}','%')
and lrole=#{operole}
and lip like CONCAT('%','${opeip}','%')
